name: question_lead
template:
Create a short, punchy script broken into {segments_count} segments.
Topic: {topic}
Hook: {hook}
Requirements:
- Return ONLY JSON with keys: title, segments.
- segments is a list of objects with keys: narration, visual_prompt.
- Each narration is 1-2 sentences, 18-55 words.
- Each visual_prompt is 1 sentence, cinematic, vertical 9:16, no text.
- Keep tone curious and vivid.
- IMPORTANT: output raw JSON only (no quotes, no markdown, no extra text).
